why: Many speak a different flavour of English than the United States. Minimise your frustration by synchronising Plover's behaviour with your own. Around 2300 entries from the default dictionary have been replaced, checking against a wordlist of over 1700 words.
how: Just add this dictionary to Plover's list, such that it takes precedence over your core Plover dictionary (`dict.json` or `main.json`).
